cast.name: 史蒂文·威廉姆斯 Steven Williams
杰西卡·莫里斯 Jessica Morris
蒂凡妮·谢皮斯 Tiffany Shepis
布兰丁·拉克立 Brandin Rackley
布兰登霍布斯 Brandon Fobbs
伊丽莎白·菲尔兹 Elizabeth Fields

writer.name: 伊丽莎白·菲尔兹 Elizabeth Fields

introduction: Six friends, on their annual camping trip, are having the time of their lives, enjoying the lake, roasting marshmallows, and telling scary stories around the fire. As the night goes on, four gruesome stories are shared... the story of Mike and Kathy, a young couple who has come to ease their ailing aunt's transition to better living... or so they say... the tale of Jake and Amy, who get more than they bargained for on a romantic getaway turned nightmare... the story of a vengeful spider, on a mission of terror... and the tale of siblings, Sam and Emily, who have developed an insatiable appetite for human flesh. As the night grows darker, and the tales grow stranger, the friends begin to realize that some stories should be left untold.
